column4: but that could be the problem i guess because this is the first time ive installed to a smalelr partition

I DID THAT SAUVIN THATS HOW IM HERE LOL
it didnt work before i loaded the clone
i had windows OK, then i shrunk NTFS and loaded linux on it, and from the linxu boot men i cannot load windows again...i thought that was normal

noo what i mean is i only recently tried the clone

because 4g was huge back when fat32 came out
ntfs is NewTechnology Filesystem, originally developed for Win NT, but not released to 2k and xp...
